author: Ian Asman

text:
What is this, a pretty bad movie game composed by Dean Evans? Such a surprise. This was before he probably had access to higher quality instruments (Waterworld, Flintstones, etc.). Still, I really like it. Dean Evans rarely disappoints. 

Lethal Weapon's a great movie too.
